author: costin
msg: Note that we no longer create new workers in lb_worker - all workers
are created by workerEnv, as they are declared.
lb will just register the names, and get the worker object
from workerEnv during init() ( when it's supposed all workers
are already created and set up ).
This is the most likely place to get 'runtime setProperty' to
work, i.e. add more workers, etc.
